QuestData.Title: Push Them Out
QuestData.Description: The people are free, but the town is still occupied by the Forsaken. They're cut off from their main force, so if we're to drive them out, now's our chance.$B$BTheir leader, Executor Cornell, is known for his unbound ruthlessness. Also among them is Valnov the Mad, a so-called scientist who carries out inhuman experiments on villagers too old to work the mines.$B$BTake care of them all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 4 Forsaken Infantry, Executor Cornell and Valnov the Mad in Emberstone Village.
QuestData.RewardText: We have the people of Emberstone on our side now thanks to you.
